author: willybsm
post_text: August 15, 2014 at 4:27 PM#1[color=#FF0000]watch out:This operating macro for release 3.0.0.2 and higher![/color]Sorry for my bad translation.This macro enables a lamp on a range of defined groups. The Lamp On is performed automatically group after group.- Select the number of the first group, e-g 10- Select the number of the latter group, e-g 23- and enter your serial.The macro will do the rest.---------------------------Preparation of the macro:A preset must be present in the CONTROL palette and named identically:[color=#FF0000]LampOn[/color]Line 1: Personalize your serialLine 10 and 11: Change the location number ( 65 ) of the macro in your macro palette.[Blocked Image:https://za0umw.sn2.livefilestore.com/y2p1sItO3pg-PeZ3I1h2Si3kcUmr5vhcCNfNI-N9xduh49zVPlDCqaboCxCvUVx4jSe1AQ70fT4TesrbjN87MCRdf6V5Iv2oza0AbspDk6Zus4/lamp%20on%203004.jpg?psid=1]EnjoyFilesLAMP ON 3.0.0.4.xml2.92 kB – 62 Downloads

posts.post_text: August 15, 2014 at 4:27 PM#1[color=#FF0000]watch out:This operating macro for release 3.0.0.2 and higher![/color]Sorry for my bad translation.This macro enables a lamp on a range of defined groups. The Lamp On is performed automatically group after group.- Select the number of the first group, e-g 10- Select the number of the latter group, e-g 23- and enter your serial.The macro will do the rest.---------------------------Preparation of the macro:A preset must be present in the CONTROL palette and named identically:[color=#FF0000]LampOn[/color]Line 1: Personalize your serialLine 10 and 11: Change the location number ( 65 ) of the macro in your macro palette.[Blocked Image:https://za0umw.sn2.livefilestore.com/y2p1sItO3pg-PeZ3I1h2Si3kcUmr5vhcCNfNI-N9xduh49zVPlDCqaboCxCvUVx4jSe1AQ70fT4TesrbjN87MCRdf6V5Iv2oza0AbspDk6Zus4/lamp%20on%203004.jpg?psid=1]EnjoyFilesLAMP ON 3.0.0.4.xml2.92 kB – 62 Downloads
